postScript:
:SET &RID# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=*")
:PROCESS &RID#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# > 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

:SET &RID2# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=0*")
:PROCESS &RID2#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID2#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# = 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

:IF &COUNT# <> ""
:SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1
:PUB &COUNT#,,TASK
:ELSE 
:SET &COUNT# = 1
:PUB &COUNT#,,TASK
:ENDIF

:IF  &EXITCODE# > 0
:  IF &COUNT# = 12
:    STOP MSG, 15, "Error, script failed"
:  ENDIF
:  IF &COUNT# <> 12
:    STOP MSG, 14, "Error, waiting for restart"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF
preScript:
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB('${IN_AGENT}', '[','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, ']','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, '"','')
:PRINT &TMP#

:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3
:FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TMP#,".")
:SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:SET &AGENT# = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:PUB &AGENT#

:SET &DELAY# = 60
:SET &CHECK_COUNT# = 1
:SET &CHECK_COUNT_MAX# = 10

:WHILE &CHECK_COUNT# LE &CHECK_COUNT_MAX#
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&AGENT#)
:  SET &CHECK_COUNT_F# = FORMAT(&CHECK_COUNT#)
:  PRINT "Checking agent: &AGENT# status &CHECK_COUNT_F# time(s) ..."
:  IF  &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:    PRINT "Agent: &AGENT# is up."
:    SET &CHECK_COUNT# =  &CHECK_COUNT_MAX#
:  ELSE
:    SET &DELAY_F# = FORMAT(&DELAY#)
:    PRINT "Agent: &AGENT# is down!"
:    PRINT "Waiting &DELAY_F# seconds for next check ..."
:    WAIT &DELAY#
:  ENDIF
:  SET &CHECK_COUNT# = &CHECK_COUNT# + 1
:ENDWHILE
:PUBLISH &AGENT_ALIVE#

:SET &EXITCODE# = "0"
:PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW

processingCommand.script:
:IF ${AGENT_ALIVE#} = "N"
:STOP MSG,3,NODE_IS_DOWN
:ENDIF
echo ">> Instance: ${IN_INSTANCE}"
echo ">> Module: ${IN_MODULE}"
echo ">> Machine Function: ${IN_MACHINE_FUNCTION}"
echo ">> Hostname: `hostname`"
echo ">> Shell: $SHELL"
echo ">> Username: ${IN_USERNAME}"
echo ">> Parameters: ${IN_PARAMETERS}"
echo ">> Executing: sudo su - ${IN_USERNAME} -c \"${IN_SCRIPT_NAME} ${IN_PARAMETERS}\""
echo ">> Script output: "

for i in {1..20}
 do
 sleep 30

 sudo su - ${IN_USERNAME} -c "${IN_SCRIPT_NAME} ${IN_PARAMETERS}"
 EXITCODE=$?

 if [[ $EXITCODE -eq 0 ]] 
  then 
  break 
 fi
done

echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
exit $EXITCODE
